text:
Have you ever had a template with a slider image specified at 800px wide but your client uploads images for print and are 2,000px wide. Then a month later they send you a Google Page Speed Report and ask you to make their pages load faster? :homealone:

If this rings true, please upvote! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-ability-to-set-a-maximum-image-size-on-the-image-field-to/idi-p/349193#M59587>
Hey! Try looking up the resize_image_url function! It might help you out in your modules
Hi all, just wanna ask is there an email validation script to block free email providers for custom form?
